Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.board

Class Board

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.board.Board
All Implemented Interfaces:
IBoard, Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Board2Players, Board3Players, Board4Players
public abstract class Board extends Object implements Serializable, IBoard
This class represents the game's board.

  • Method Details

    • updateBoard

      public void updateBoard()
      This method refills the board when needed (if all the tiles are isolated or if the board is empty).
      Specified by:
      updateBoard in interface IBoard

    • restoreTiles

      public void restoreTiles(Map<Tile,Coordinate> map) throws WrongTilesException, WrongCoordinateException, CellNotEmptyException
      Restore tiles on the board following a picking action and disconnection of the player.
      Parameters:
      map - containing tiles picked and coordinate of where tiles were picked.
      Throws:
      WrongTilesException - wrong tiles passed.
      WrongCoordinateException - wrong coordinates passed.
      CellNotEmptyException - wrong cell selected. The cell is not empty.

    • isPickable

      public boolean isPickable(int row, int col) throws InvalidParameterException
      This method checks is a tile can be picked or not (so if it has at least one free side and at least one occupied side). Check also the validity of the parameters
      Parameters:
      row - row coordinate of the cell to check.
      col - col coordinate of the cell to check.
      Returns:
      true if the tile can be picked.
      Throws:
      InvalidParameterException

    • removeTile

      public Tile removeTile(int row, int col)
      This method removes the tile the player has chosen.
      Parameters:
      row - row of the tile the player has chosen.
      col - column of the tile the player has chosen.
      Returns:
      the tile the player has picked.

      public Tile getTile(int row, int col)

      row - row
      col - column
